items.title: Recommendations on How to Celebrate Halloween Safely and Prevent Spread of COVID-19
items.summary: As COVID-19 transmission remains in the CDC high or “red tier” in Napa County, Napa County Public Health would like to remind residents that many commonly celebrated Halloween activities carry risk for spreading COVID-19. Limiting your...

items.title: Bay Area Health Officers Issue Criteria for Lifting COVID-19 Indoor Masking Requirements
items.summary: As decisions to vaccinate and wear face coverings indoors drive down COVID-19 case rates and hospitalizations, health officers for the nine Bay Area jurisdictions that require face coverings in most indoor public spaces today reached consensus on criteria...
